item.title: An ARM based Virtual Network designed for change
item.description: Creating an ARM template designed for change can be hard. Whilst there are plenty of examples out there on creating basic virtual networks with ARM templates, they generally are not structured to support the ongoing change over time we need. This post outlines an approach and structure that balances simplicity and extensibility while keeping the ARM templates terse and easy to maintain.
